item.title: The IDEs I use
item.description: People who code have a tendency to spend a lot of time in various IDEs (Integrated Development Environments). They can be as simple as a text editor or as complex as a full-blown development environment. In this post, I’ll go through my two go-to IDE’s, RStudio and VScode, and why I switch between them rather than sticking to a single one.
